sourcesContent:
import { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Transition, Listbox } from '@headlessui/react' import { CheckCircleIcon, ExclamationCircleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import { SelectorIcon, CheckIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import { database, getUserInfo } from '../firebase' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' import { countryData } from '../variables/countries' import Nav from '../components/nav' import Footer from '../components/footer' function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } let countries = [] let count = 1 countryData.map((country) => { count = count + 1 return ( countries.push({ id: count, name: country.name }) ) }) export default function Update() { const { currentUser } = useAuth() const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState('') const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('') const [age, setAge] = useState('') const [updateData, setUpdateData] = useState(false) const [message, setMessage] = useState('') const [count, setCount] = useState(1) const [selected, setSelected] = useState('') const [parent1Email, setParent1Email] = useState('') const [parent2Email, setParent2Email] = useState('') useEffect(() => { document.title = 'Update Profile - Everaise Launch' }) useEffect(() => { getUserInfo(currentUser.email) .then((doc) => { setFirstName(doc.data().first_name) setLastName(doc.data().last_name) setAge(doc.data().age) setParent1Email(doc.data().parent1Email) setParent2Email(doc.data().parent2Email) setSelected({ id: 4000, name: doc.data().country }) }) }, [currentUser]) function handleUpdate(event) { event.preventDefault() database.users.doc(currentUser.email).update({ age: age, first_name: firstName, last_name: lastName, parent1Email: parent1Email, parent2Email: parent2Email, country: selected.name, }) setUpdateData(!updateData) setCount(count+1) setMessage('Profile successfully updated (' + count + ')') } return (

Your Profile

Personal Information

{'* '}Denotes a required field.

setFirstName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="first_name" id="first_name" autoComplete="given-name" className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm" />
setLastName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="last_name" id="last_name" autoComplete="family-name" className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm" />
setParent1Email(e.target.value)} type="email" name="email" id="email" autoComplete="email" className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm" />
setParent2Email(e.target.value)} type="email" name="email" id="email" autoComplete="email" className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm" />
setAge(e.target.value)} type="number" name="age" id="age" autoComplete="number" className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm" >
{({ open }) => ( <>
{selected.name} {countries.map((country) => ( classNames( active ? 'text-white bg-indigo-600' : 'text-gray-900', 'cursor-default select-none relative py-2 pl-3 pr-9' ) } value={country} > {({ selected, active }) => ( <> {country.name} {selected ? ( ) : null} )} ))}
)}

To update the email associated with your account, send an email to info@everaise.org

{message &&

{message}

}
) }
